messages.subject: Fw: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.
messages.msgSnippet: This is the reply from the person who posted the origninal info, hth Tracy ... From: Terra Viva Organics  To:
messages.messageBody:
This is the reply from the person who posted the origninal info, hth

Tracy



----- Original Message -----
From: Terra Viva Organics <arzeena@...>
To: <organic-gardening@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, March 14, 2000 4:38 AM
Subject: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.


> Tracy,
>
> In the Infant formula, vegetarian products (& so-called meat products),
the
> GM ingredient is Round-up Ready soybean. The cornflakes and corn-derived
> products contain GM corn that is inserted with the Bt toxin. I'm not
quite
> sure what the key ingredient in the diet products is - it could be
> sweetener derived from corn syrup or soy that's used to increase the
protein
> content.
>
> Keep in mind that this is not an all-inclusive list, it only includes
> products that have actually been tested. Here in N. America, anything
that
> contains canola oil or soybean oil is pretty much guaranteed to be
> contaminated with GM products. That's a huge number of items!
>
> Arzeena
> -----------------------------------
> Terra Viva Organics
> Looking for organic Seed?
> www.tvorganics.com
> ----------------------------------
>
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Tracy Oldfield <Tracy@...-online.co.uk>
> To: <organic-gardening@egroups.com>
> Sent: Monday, March 13, 2000 4:35 PM
> Subject: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.
>
>
> > I took the huge liberty (sorry, should have asked first, bad netiquette,
> can
> > you ever forgive me?) of forwarding this list to a couple of other lists
> I'm
> > on, and soemone asked what the GM ingredients were. Do you know what is
> GM
> > in each product? TIA!
> >
> > Tracy
> >
> > From: Terra Viva Organics <arzeena@...>
> >
> > > Since the topic of GM products in infant formula came up, I thought
the
> > list
> > > might be interested in products that have been found to contain GM
> > > ingredients.
> > >
> > > The list comes from Greenpeace and Genetic ID, a lab in Idaho that
tests
> > for
> > > GM products. Many of these products may not be available in the UK
but
> I
> > > know there are a fair number of N. Americans on this list who'd like
to
> > > know.
> > >
> > > Carnation Alsoy Infant formula
> > > Similac Isomil Infant formula
> > > Neocare Infant formula Gardenburger
> > > Enfamil Prosobee Infant formula
> > > Heinz 2 Baby Cereal
> > > General Mills Total Corn Flakes
> > > Kellogg's Corn Flakes
> > > Post Blueberry Morning Cereal
> > >
> > > Betty Crocker Bac-os Bacon Bits
> > > Ball Park Franks
> > > Boca Burger Chef Max's Favourite
> > > Green Giant Harvest Burgers (now called Morningstar Farms)
> > > Morningstar Farms Better'n Burgers
> > > Light Life Gimme Lean
> > > McDonald's McVeggie Burgers
> > >
> > > Mix Bravos Tortilla Chips
> > > Frito-Lay Fritos Corn Chips
> > > Old El Paso Taco Shells
> > > Tostitos Crispy Rounds
> > > Doritos Nacho Cheesier
> > >
> > >
> > > Aunt Jemima Pancake
> > > Duncan Hines Cake Mix
> > > Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix Nabisco
> > > Snackwell's Granola Bars
> > > Quaker Yellow Corn Meal
> > > Quick Loaf Bread Mix
> > >
> > > Ultra Slim Fast
> > > Ovaltine Malt Powdered Beverage Mix
> > >
> > > Arzeena
> > > --------------------------
> > > Terra Viva Organics
> > > Looking for organic seed?
> > > www.tvorganics.com
> > > ---------------------------

messages.subject: Fw: [organic-gardening] Re: GM Products - Infant formula et al.
messages.msgSnippet: Someone sent this to an organic gardening list I m on, thought it might be of interest... ... Tracy ... list ... for
messages.messageBody:
Someone sent this to an organic gardening list I'm on, thought it might be
of interest...

:-)
Tracy

> Since the topic of GM products in infant formula came up, I thought the
list
> might be interested in products that have been found to contain GM
> ingredients.
>
> The list comes from Greenpeace and Genetic ID, a lab in Idaho that tests
for
> GM products. Many of these products may not be available in the UK but I
> know there are a fair number of N. Americans on this list who'd like to
> know.
>
> Carnation Alsoy Infant formula
> Similac Isomil Infant formula
> Neocare Infant formula Gardenburger
> Enfamil Prosobee Infant formula
> Heinz 2 Baby Cereal
> General Mills Total Corn Flakes
> Kellogg's Corn Flakes
> Post Blueberry Morning Cereal
>
> Betty Crocker Bac-os Bacon Bits
> Ball Park Franks
> Boca Burger Chef Max's Favourite
> Green Giant Harvest Burgers (now called Morningstar Farms)
> Morningstar Farms Better'n Burgers
> Light Life Gimme Lean
> McDonald's McVeggie Burgers
>
> Mix Bravos Tortilla Chips
> Frito-Lay Fritos Corn Chips
> Old El Paso Taco Shells
> Tostitos Crispy Rounds
> Doritos Nacho Cheesier
>
>
> Aunt Jemima Pancake
> Duncan Hines Cake Mix
> Jiffy Corn Muffin Mix Nabisco
> Snackwell's Granola Bars
> Quaker Yellow Corn Meal
> Quick Loaf Bread Mix
>
> Ultra Slim Fast
> Ovaltine Malt Powdered Beverage Mix
>
> Arzeena

> Terra Viva Organics
